alert.note: Alert for Pacific (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 05 at 1:18PM PST until December 05 at 10:40PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington... Willapa River near Willapa affecting Pacific County. For the Nw Oregon / Sw Washington Coast...including Willapa...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Willapa River near Willapa. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...Above 21.0 feet, expect flooding of several roads along the river, including Heckard Road. Portions of US Hwy 101 may be flooded as well if flood crest corresponds to high tide. Also expect minor flooding in Raymond. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage around 2 pm today and crest around 21.5 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage around 7 pm this evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM PST.
